rewrite1: For the seventh paragraph, apply a bold wavy underline and align the text to the left. Then, change the font to SimHei.
rewrite2: In the seventh paragraph, apply a bold wave-style underline, align the text to the left, and change the font to SimHei.
rewrite3: In the seventh paragraph, apply a thick wavy underline for emphasis. Align the text to the left and change the font to SimHei.
